Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Execute Javascript
kw.arg: var editor = document.querySelector('.CodeMirror').CodeMirror; editor.setValue(editor.getValue() + ' Welcome {{customer_name}}! Thank you for registering.');
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.arg: var editor = document.querySelector('.CodeMirror').CodeMirror; editor.setValue(editor.getValue() + ' Welcome {{customer_name}}! Thank you for registering.');
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keyword Unless
kw.arg: var editor = document.querySelector('[name="Mail_template[body]"]'); if(editor) { editor.value = editor.value + ' Welcome {{customer_name}}! Thank you for registering.'; }
kw.doc: *DEPRECATED since RF 5.0. Use Native IF/ELSE or `Run Keyword If` instead.*

errors.msg: The chromedriver version (140.0.7339.208) detected in PATH at C:\Users\Anand\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python312\Scripts\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (141.0.7390.54); currently, chromedriver 141.0.7390.54 is recommended for chrome 141.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
